original: Åhmansson, Nils Carl Erik, assu-ransdirektör, Göteborg, f. 20/12/97 i Gbg av dir. Nils E. Ä. o. Anna Larsson. G. 34 m. Ingeborg Wulff. Barn: Gunvor f. 35, Ingela 36, Nils Erik 41. —• Verkst. dir. i Sv:es ångf. assur, fören. 43, i Ömises. Förs :bol. Protec-tion & Indemnity fr. 46. Led. av krigs-försäkr md 43, styr :led. i Lloyds’ Reg. sv. komm.. fr. 43, i A-B Gbgs Hand:-bank 46. RVO, FFrK.
translated: Åhmansson, Nils Carl Erik, insurance director, Gothenburg, born on December 20th, 1897 in Gothenburg to director Nils E. Ä. and Anna Larsson. Married in 1934 to Ingeborg Wulff. Children: Gunvor born in 1935, Ingela in 1936, Nils Erik in 1941. Executive director of Svenska Ångfartygs Assuransföreningen from 1943, in Ömises Försäkringsbolag on Protection & Indemnity from 1946. Member of the war insurance committee since 1943, board member in Lloyd's Register Swedish committee from 1943, in AB Goteborgs Handelsbank from 1946. Received the Royal Order of Vasa, the Order of the Polar Star.
